task.title: Remove Duplicated Units
task.shortdesc: Follow these steps to remove duplicated entries in a TMX file.

context.p: Duplicated translation units increase the size of a TMX file and slow down TM searches.

step.cmd: Open the TMX file that you want to modify.
In main menu, select Tasks Remove Duplicated Units .

taskbody.result: A progress dialog is displayed while duplicated units are removed. The editing window is refreshed to reflect the changes.
